og.description: DOVER — Delaware lawmakers say they are facing the prospect of cutting services or hoping for a jump in revenue after updated Medicaid projections have the state in a $28.5 million hole. Appearing before the Joint Finance Committee on Wednesday, officials from the Division of Medicaid and Medical Assistance detailed the shortfall which the committee …
